channel.title: Eclipse [639] -=-Summoning-=-Nex-=-Jad-=-Dungeoneering-=- [639]
channel.description:
[CENTER]Hey everyone, Eclipse 639 has been around for a few months now on and off, Our previous projects have died from lack of funding and Developmental Help. But over the past few weeks I have taken the steps to begin on our path towards becoming the [b]Ultimate 639[/b]. [img]http://eclipse639.com/images/ambient_lighting/misc/images/logo.png[/img]
[COLOR=Red][u][b]We are now Running 2 Worlds![/b][/u][/COLOR] World 1 consists of PvP/Bossing/Master, No training is necessary, This world is more for players who like to just Pk and Boss ================================================================================= World 2, However, Is a Skilling/Training Server. You can still spawn with a few exceptions of certain Items. There is also a 100% Point Shop, Just talk to the rewards trader at home!
[u][b]Eclipse 639 VPS/Dedi Speeds[/b][/u] World 1: [img]http://www.speedtest.net/result/1665894778.png[/img]
World 2: [img]http://www.speedtest.net/result/1665891308.png[/img]
[B]There are many things that make this server Unique. Take a peek at the Pictures and Features Listed below to check out some Cool stuff we have that others don't :)
[size=10pt]Summoning In Game[/size] [img]http://eclipse639.com/summoning.png[/img]
Items such as Chaotics, Zaros Armour, Spirit Shields, And Godswords Are expensive to spawn, As they are Valuable Pieces of Weaponry/Armour
Nex uses all 3 attack styles and hits through prayer.
[COLOR=purple]Some interesting features: Nex uses all 3 attack styles and hits through prayer. Bossing for valuable Weapons/Armour/Items Economy/PvP Spawn Server Stable VPS! Daily Updates Active Staff VBulletin Forums![/COLOR]
[u][b]Minigames:[/b][/u] Soulwars - 35% Pest Control Duel Arena -100% Castle Wars - 100% Clan Wars - 50%
[u][b]Bosses:[/b][/u] Frost Dragons General Graardor Commander Zilyana Kree' Arra Kril Tsustaroth Nex Barrows Brothers Ice Strykewyrms Chaos Elemental Jad Tormented Demons
=================================================================================
More Coming Soon...
And Now... Time for some Pics!
[img]http://eclipse639.com/pics/w2home.png[/img] [img]http://eclipse639.com/pics/deeppk.png[/img] [img]http://eclipse639.com/pics/icestrykes.png[/img] [img]http://eclipse639.com/pics/safepk.png[/img] [img]http://eclipse639.com/pics/slay.png[/img] [img]http://eclipse639.com/pics/token.png[/img] [img]http://i1222.photobucket.com/albums/dd483/eclipse639/welove.png[/img] [img]http://i1222.photobucket.com/albums/dd483/eclipse639/nex3.png[/img] [img]http://i1222.photobucket.com/albums/dd483/eclipse639/nex2.png[/img] [img]http://i1222.photobucket.com/albums/dd483/eclipse639/nex4.png[/img] [img]http://i1222.photobucket.com/albums/dd483/eclipse639/nex.png[/img] [img]http://i1222.photobucket.com/albums/dd483/eclipse639/pk2.png[/img] [img]http://i1222.photobucket.com/albums/dd483/eclipse639/pk.png[/img] [img]http://i1222.photobucket.com/albums/dd483/eclipse639/skele.png[/img]
[/B][/CENTER]

At the moment I am the Only developer working on Eclipse 639.

Got it. Good luck with this.

@Eclipse639 wrote:

[CENTER]Hey everyone, Eclipse 639 has been around for a few months now on and off, Our previous projects have died from lack of funding and Developmental Help. But over the past few weeks I have taken the steps to begin on our path towards becoming the Ultimate 639.

[COLOR=Red]We are now Running 2 Worlds![/COLOR]
World 1 consists of PvP/Bossing/Master, No training is necessary, This world is more for players who like to just Pk and Boss

World 2, However, Is a Skilling/Training Server. You can still spawn with a few exceptions of certain Items. There is also a 100% Point Shop, Just talk to the rewards trader at home!

Eclipse 639 VPS/Dedi Speeds
World 1:

World 2:

[B]There are many things that make this server Unique. Take a peek at the Pictures and Features Listed below to check out some Cool stuff we have that others don’t

[size=10pt]Summoning In Game[/size]

Items such as Chaotics, Zaros Armour, Spirit Shields, And Godswords Are expensive to spawn, As they are Valuable Pieces of Weaponry/Armour

Nex uses all 3 attack styles and hits through prayer.

[COLOR=purple]Some interesting features:
Nex uses all 3 attack styles and hits through prayer.
